properties.areaDesc: Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Storm Watch issued January 31 at 2:08PM PST until February 2 at 9:00PM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, northwest winds 10 to 20
kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 10 to 13 feet at 13 seconds
expected. For the Storm Watch, northwest winds 25 to 35 kt
with gusts up to 50 kt and seas 15 to 18 feet at 13 seconds
possible.

* WHERE...Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 2 PM Saturday to 3
AM PST Sunday. For the Storm Watch, from late Saturday night
through Sunday evening.

* IMPACTS...Very strong winds will cause hazardous seas which
could capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare to remain in port, alter course, and/or
secure the vessel for severe conditions before conditions
deteriorate.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM SATURDAY TO 3 AM PST SUNDAY... ...STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING
